alert.note: Alert for Central Utah Mountains; Henry Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 15 at 2:38PM MDT until June 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR DRY THUNDERSTORMS...WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 493 AND 494 BELOW 7500 FEET... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Fire Weather Watch below 7500 feet for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 493 Central Utah Mountains and Fire Weather Zone 494 Henry Mountains below 7500 feet. * WINDS...South to southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...9 to 14 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated to widely scattered dry thunderstorms are possible Friday afternoon and evening. Strong and erratic outflow winds are possible. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.
